Paragraph Patterns


Simple Paragraphs

First paragraph with some content.

Second paragraph after blank line.

Third paragraph continues.

P Tags vs Divs

This is a p tag paragraph.

Another p tag paragraph.

This is a div paragraph.
Another div paragraph.

Mixed P and Div

P tag first.

Div second.

P tag third.


Single Line Paragraphs

One.
Two.
Three.

Long Paragraph

This is a very long paragraph that contains many words and sentences to test how the parser handles extended content. It goes on and on, covering multiple topics and including various details. The purpose is to ensure that long content blocks are processed correctly without any issues or truncation.

Paragraph With Inline Elements

This paragraph has bold, italic, code, and a link all together.

Paragraph After Elements

After Header

Paragraph after header.
  • List
Paragraph after list.
Quote
Paragraph after quote.

Empty Paragraphs

After empty div.

After empty p.

Paragraph With Only Formatting

Bold only paragraph.
Italic only paragraph.
Code only paragraph.
